patthana15.77:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.77:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.77:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
